tidbits.title: Diamonds and Resources
tidbits.description: Sierra Leone is known for its diamond mines, though historically, the trade has been linked to conflicts. The country also possesses diverse natural resources.

tidbits.title: Resilience and Recovery
tidbits.description: After a period of civil war, Sierra Leone has made strides in recovery and development, focusing on peacebuilding, economic growth, and societal reconstruction.

tidbits.title: Cultural Richness
tidbits.description: The country's cultural richness is reflected in its music, art, and traditions, with diverse ethnic groups contributing to its vibrant heritage.
